resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104629</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104629</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Paradise Redefined: Part 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Paradies Umdefiniert: Teil 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Paradis Redéfini : Partie 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Paradise Redefinido: Parte 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Paradise Ridefinito: Parte 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παράδεισος που επαναπροσδιορίζεται: Μέρος 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Paraíso Redefinido: Parte 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A journey to a coral reef chain hidden in the Central Pacific forces scientists to revisit the definition of a pristine environment. Part Two.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Reise nach einer Korallenriffkette, die im 
zentralen Pazifik versteckt wird, erzwingt Wissenschaftler, die 
Definition einer pristine Umgebung nochmals zu besuchen. Teil 
Zwei.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un voyage à une chaîne de récif de corail 
cachée dans le Pacifique central force des scientifiques à revisiter
la définition d'un environnement primitif. Partie Deux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma viagem a uma corrente do recife coral 
escondida no Pacífico central força cientistas a revisitar a 
definição de um ambiente pristine. Parte Dois.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un viaggio ad una catena del reef di corallo 
nascosta nel Pacifico centrale forza gli scienziati rivisitare la 
definizione di un ambiente pristine. Parte Due.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα ταξίδι σε μια αλυσίδα κοραλλιογενών υφάλων που 
κρύβεται στους κεντρικούς ειρηνικούς επιστήμονες δυνάμεων για να 
ξαναεπισκεφτεί τον καθορισμό ενός παλιού περιβάλλοντος. 
Μέρος δύο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un viaje a un encadenamiento del filón coralino 
ocultado en el Pacífico central fuerza a científicos revisitar la 
definición de un ambiente prístino. Parte Dos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

FN:SCRIPPS INSTITUTION OF OCEANOGRAPHY
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>20101438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 3.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104629</entry>
    </identifier>

    <item>
      <location>

  </manifestation>
